sect2.title: Dependencies
sect2.para: Psmisc-&psmisc-depversion; needs the following to be installed:
sect2.literallayout: bash: sh binutils: as, ld diffutils: cmp fileutils: chmod, cp, ls, mv, rm gcc: cc grep: egrep, grep make: make sed: sed sh-utils: basename, expr, sleep, uname textutils: cat, tr
